ValidationRule.description: Makes Minutes Worked required if Originating Group is entered and the case is Solved for Service Support 401k/S125 Case Record Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")),RecordType.Name = 'Service Support 401k/S125 Case', NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(x401_k_Reason__c))), ISBLANK(Minutes_Worked__c ), CONTAINS(TEXT(Status),'Solved') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Minutes Worked field is required if Originating Group field is entered
